application

Class ArticleEditModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ArticleEditModel

  • class ArticleEditModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to represent an article when it is editing This class is needed to develop NewsEditController
    Author:
    √ÅngelLucas

      • commit

        public void commit()
        Make changes permanent. Changes can't be undone Copy article data from the edited one to the original

      • discardChanges

        public void discardChanges()
        Discard all changes. Changes will be lost Copy article data from the original one to the edited
